preference.name: publish_to_file_system_loc
preference.preference_description: Specifies the name of the parent folder to store published content. Valid Values: Accepts a single string as a value. This directory is relative to the path defined in the deploy_absolute_path preference, unless it begins with a forward slash (/) on UNIX or Linux or drive:\ on Windows. In those cases, it becomes an absolute path. For example, dataDirectory
